choices: A dead relative is watching over you.
You will have bad luck next year.
You will have good luck next year.
correct: A dead relative is watching over you.

text: According to Halloween superstition, what should you do if you want to see a witch?
choices: Put your clothes on inside out and walk backwards.
Look in a mirror in the dark.
Spin a broom in the air.
correct: Put your clothes on inside out and walk backwards.

text: On Halloween night owls swoop down and feast on the souls of the dying. How can you protect yourself?
On Halloween night evil spirits roam the earth. How can you protect yourself?
choices: Bury animal bones in your front yard.
Carry a spider in a jar.
correct: Bury animal bones in your front yard.
